keyword: how many calories in a cherry tomato
title: How Many Calories in a Cherry Tomato?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a cherry tomato, plus carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and other nutrients on a per-unit basis with quick tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a Cherry Tomato?
assumptions: Average cherry tomato (~17 g), raw, fresh, no added seasonings or oils.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One average cherry tomato has about 3 kcal and is mostly water with some vitamins.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison; scaled from per-100 g data adjusted for ~17 g average weight.

tweaks.label: In a salad with 1 tbsp vinaigrette dressing

faqs.q: How many calories in a cherry tomato?
faqs.a: About 3 kcal for one average-sized cherry tomato.
Yes, only 0.7 g carbs per cherry tomato, with 0.2 g fiber.

faqs.q: What nutrients are in a cherry tomato besides calories?
faqs.a: Provides vitamin C, potassium, and lycopene; negligible protein and fat.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in cherry tomatoes?
faqs.a: Larger ones (~25 g) may have 5 kcal; smaller (~10 g) around 2 kcal.

faqs.q: Calories in cherry tomatoes vs. regular tomatoes?
faqs.a: Similar per gram (~18 kcal/100 g); cherry tomatoes are just smaller portions.
